text: The 1896 Colgate football team represented Colgate University in the 1896 college football season. The team captain for the 1896 season was Warwick Ford.http://gocolgateraiders.com.s3.amazonaws.com/documents/2012/11/28/Year- by-Year_Results.pdf?id=2765 ==Schedule== 1896 Colgate Game-by-Game Records, College Football Data Warehouse, retrieved January 7, 2017. ==References== Colgate Category:Colgate Raiders football seasons Colgate football
title: 1896 Colgate football team
